name: DAGGER: The Fire in Tun Fatimah
name_original: DAGGER: The Fire in Tun Fatimah
description:
DAGGER : The Fire in Tun Fatimah ~~Prologue Released~~

There was once a woman with beauty, brawns, and brains, and her name is Tun Fatimah. Tun Fatimah is the Queen of Malacca, and her fame is known across Malacca in the 16th century. This is a modernized retelling of her story of how she became our beloved warrioress that she is today. The story of how she sought revenge for her family, and her country. But first, we must start from the beginning. 

Tun Fatimah was in wood practicing her silat, swaying her dagger through the harsh wind when suddenly the sky turned black and rain started pouring heavily. It is time for her to go back home, surely everything will be normal, right?

As she reached home, she saw with her own two eyes, the body of her dear beloved husband, cold and stiff, just lying on the wooden floor. Upon closer inspection, everything finally made sense to Tun Fatimah. Anger and rage began to fill her up.  Her heart was keen on revenge. She knew exactly why, but do you?
